text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki mere paravaradigaar ne to insaaph ka hukm diya hai aur (ye bhee qaraar diya hai ki) har namaaz ke vakt apane apane munh (qibale kee taraf) seedhe kar liya karo aur isake lie niree kharee ibaadat karake usase dua maango jis tarah usane tumhen shuroo shuroo paida kiya tha
